intro.greeting: Hello, I'm a senior software developer traveling around the world!

intro.title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Israel is a senior software developer based in Spain, passionate about developing high-quality software products while traveling the world. He has extensive experience in high availability and concurrency environments, excelling in performance optimization. Israel's dedication to his craft makes him a valuable asset to any project.
hobbies: üßó climbing, üèÇ snowboarding, üß≠ travel, ü§ø scuba diving, ‚®ã maths (especially linear algebra and statistics), üß† Artificial Intelligence.

works.name: Devo
short_description: Cloud-native company offering real-time security analytics, machine learning, and scalable solutions for enterprise data management.
full_description: Devo is a leading cloud-native logging and security analytics company providing real-time insights and advanced analytics for enterprise data. Their robust platform helps organizations detect, analyze, and respond to security threats efficiently.
contribution: At Devo, I improved the data ingestion team, focusing on the load balancer. I helped the system handle 60TB per day and achieved FedRAMP certification. I also developed a multi-region and multi-cloud backup system, ensuring data redundancy.

projects.name: Improve existing load balancer
description: I enhanced Devo's load balancer by implementing strategies for fault tolerance and optimized data monitoring. I supported the RELP protocol and developed client-specific load balancing methods.

projects.name: Create a multi-cloud backup system
description: I developed a multi-cloud backup system to ensure data protection and availability, automating data transition and implementing robust recovery mechanisms.

projects.name: Integrating Quality and Security Reviews into the CI/CD Pipeline
description: I integrated SonarQube, Snyk, and OWASP into Devo's CI/CD pipeline to ensure high-quality code and compliance with standards like NIST, FIPS, and FedRAMP.

projects.name: Creation of an Alert System for Monitoring with Prometheus
description: I developed an alert system using Prometheus for real-time monitoring, defining KPIs and automated response actions to ensure system health and performance.

works.name: European Commission
short_description: The European Commission is the executive branch of the European Union, responsible for proposing legislation, implementing decisions, and managing day-to-day affairs.
full_description: The European Commission enforces EU laws and negotiates international agreements. I worked in the Directorate-General for Competition (DG COMP), ensuring fair competition within the EU.
contribution: I worked as a software architect on three projects, managing non-functional requirements, prioritizing tasks, selecting technologies, defining team roles, and implementing CI/CD systems.

projects.name: Definition of Two RESTful APIs
description: I defined two RESTful APIs with HATEOAS for secure exchange of legal documents, featuring access control, data persistence, and integration with secure storage.

projects.name: E-Confidenciality
description: I developed a system for negotiating confidential legal documents, implementing dynamic verification groups and using Oracle DB and MongoDB for data management.

projects.name: Semantic index of legal documents
description: I developed a semantic indexing system for legal documents using K-Means clustering, gRPC microservices in C++14, and TensorFlow for neural network-based search.

projects.name: Development of a Renewable Energy Distribution System
description: I contributed to developing a renewable energy distribution system using Kafka-based communication, ModBus protocol, and RaspberryPi gateways.

works.name: Panel Systems
short_description: Panel Sistemas is a company specializing in technological solutions, offering software services, consulting, and development to various industries.
full_description: Panel Sistemas provides software development, consulting, and IT services to diverse industries.
contribution: I worked as a functional analyst and senior programmer, managing non-functional requirements, defining project structures, and implementing CI/CD systems.

projects.name: Modernizing Maritime and Air Transport Messaging
description: I implemented a message exchange platform for maritime and air transport, replacing the IATA standard with XML/JSON, and ensuring high availability with a replicated MongoDB database.

projects.name: Iberdrola's Intelligent Terminal Management with Siemens
description: I developed a system for managing electricity consumption terminals, using SNMP protocol and a non-relational MongoDB database for data storage and analysis.

projects.name: Monitoring and Care System for Securitas Direct
description: I developed a monitoring system for people with disabilities or the elderly, using sensors to track activities and generate alarms based on behavior patterns.

works.name: Prisa Group
short_description: Grupo PRISA is a Spanish media conglomerate, renowned for its influential newspapers, radio stations, and educational publications.
full_description: Grupo PRISA is a leading Spanish media conglomerate with a wide range of media outlets including newspapers, radio stations, television channels, and educational publications.
contribution: As a remote senior programmer, I defined project requirements, coordinated with international teams, and developed tools to improve automation and productivity.

projects.name: Educational Package Viewer Application
description: I developed an Android and iOS application for viewing educational packages, ensuring compatibility with low-end devices and SCORM standards.

projects.name: Educational Package Standardization Project
description: I developed a Flash to HTML5 translation tool to standardize educational packages, ensuring compatibility with the SCORM standard.

projects.name: Educational Platform Project
description: I developed a C#/.NET platform for managing educational tasks, integrating high-resolution audio and video communication for real-time interactions.

works.name: Intelygenz
short_description: Intelygenz is a technology company specializing in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and custom software solutions for diverse industries.
full_description: Intelygenz specializes in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and custom software solutions.
contribution: As a Senior Programmer, I contributed to three significant projects, including developing an Android app for Antena 3 Television using inaudible audio markers.

projects.name: Antena 3 Television Project
description: I developed an interactive Android app for Antena 3 Television, using inaudible audio markers to update content in real-time.

projects.name: Document Manager Project for BBVA
description: I developed a document manager for BBVA bank in C#, facilitating document management tasks and integrating with external tools.

projects.name: Collaborative Front Project
description: I developed a collaborative front-end for BBVA bank, creating a library of gestures and actions to improve user interaction.

works.name: Alcal√° de Henares University (UAH)
short_description: The University of Alcal√° de Henares is a prestigious Spanish institution known for its rich history and diverse academic programs.
full_description: The University of Alcal√° de Henares is a renowned public university near Madrid, Spain, known for its strong programs in literature, linguistics, and Spanish language studies.
contribution: As a researcher in the TIFyC group, I focused on accessibility issues, AI algorithms, artificial vision, and biometric systems. I collaborated with other universities, prepared research reports, and applied for R&D grants. I also taught courses on AI and Artificial Vision.

projects.name: Research Group Project
description: I researched innovative devices for enhancing interaction for individuals with disabilities, focusing on intuitive and accessible technologies.

projects.name: Biometric Devices Communication System
description: I developed a standardized communication system for biometric devices, ensuring seamless message exchange and collaboration.

projects.name: Research Group Web Page Project
description: I created and maintained the research group's website using Joomla CMS, ensuring it was secure, scalable, and user-friendly.

projects.name: Research Group Contributions
description: I organized seminars on Robotics, taught AI and Artificial Vision, and participated in the Hispabot robotic contest.

works.name: Knowcentury
short_description: Small business dedicated to creating web pages
full_description: Small business dedicated to creating web pages
contribution: I worked as a junior web programmer using CMS at Knowcentury.

projects.name: Websites develop
description: Implementation of web pages using CMS such as Joomla, Drupal, and Moodle.

works.name: IBM
short_description: IBM, a global technology company, specializes in cloud computing, AI, and hardware, providing innovative solutions for businesses worldwide.
full_description: IBM is a global leader in technology, offering innovative solutions in AI, cloud computing, and enterprise hardware.
contribution: I investigated the use of the IBM System Z/390s mainframe for system virtualization, utilizing Qemu to enable remote systems using Suse Linux Enterprise Edition.

projects.name: Websites develop
description: Implementation of web pages using CMS such as Joomla, Drupal, and Moodle.

university.title: Master's Degree in Artificial Intelligence in information and communication technologies
summary: Artificial intelligence and machine learning. Supervised, unsupervised, and reinforced learning. Symbolic learning, classification, and regression models. Optimization of models.
Deep nets, backpropagation, loss functions, hyperparameters, and learning strategies.
Convolutional networks and image recognition.
Sequential, recurrent networks, LSTM models.
Paralleling and computation techniques in GPU-based architectures.
Vectorization techniques. Programming with TensorFlow and Theano.
Scalable automated learning. Parallelization frameworks in computer clusters.
Applications in medicine, finance, autonomous driving, etc.

university.title: Technical Engineering in Computer Science
summary: With honors in: Artificial Intelligence, Fuzzy Logic, Artificial Vision Systems, Physics II, Mathematical Analysis, Data Structure, Networks.

complementary.title: LPIC - 2
summary: Advanced administration of Linux systems, including kernel management.
Perform advanced management of block storage, file systems, networks, authentication, and system security, including firewalls and VPN.
Install and configure core network services (DHCP, DNS, SSH, web servers, file servers, email, etc).
Monitor systems and advise management on automation and purchases.

complementary.title: LPIC - 1
summary: Install a Linux system, including X11 and configure it as a network client.
Work in the command line.
Manage files and access permissions, including ACL, as well as system security.
Perform simple maintenance tasks.

complementary.title: Design and evaluation of digital educational contents
summary: Design of educational content through the SCORM standard.

complementary.title: Course of artificial vision
summary: Systems of artificial vision, convolutional matrices, filters.
